errors.error_description: The example usage command `mov-cli --query youtube blender studio` is incorrect. The flag for searching is `-s` or `--scraper`, not `--query`.
correction_candidates: Replace `mov-cli --query youtube blender studio` with `mov-cli -s youtube blender studio`.
Replace `mov-cli --query youtube blender studio` with `mov-cli --search youtube blender studio`.
Replace `mov-cli --query youtube blender studio` with `mov-cli -q youtube blender studio`.
Replace `mov-cli --query youtube blender studio` with `mov-cli search --scraper youtube blender studio`.
errors.golden_answer: Replace `mov-cli --query youtube blender studio` with `mov-cli -s youtube blender studio`.

errors.error_description: The markdown link reference for the license file points to `./LICENSE.md`, but the file in the repository is named `LICENSE`.
correction_candidates: Rename the `LICENSE` file in the repository to `LICENSE.md`.
Change `[license-url]: ./LICENSE.md` to point to the full GitHub URL of the license file.
Remove the `.md` extension from all file links in the README.
